title: Self-Directed Reflective Writing-Based Simulation Training for Public Health Biology Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational public health biology theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on current practitioners analyzing field problems through VR simulations and connecting theory with practice through reflective writing

learning_goals: Learners can analyze public health biology problems in a VR simulation environment and compose reflective writing assignments
Learners can apply Gibbs' Reflective Cycle during reflective writing to perform critical thinking and self-reflection
Learners can apply knowledge acquired through reflective writing outcomes to personal and community health promotion cases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
